pullRequest.title: Support distinct error type in balo and jvm codegen
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
$subject.
Support exporting distinct error type information in balo format and add preliminary runtime typechecking support to distinct error types.

commit.message: Support distinct error type in balo files
Support distinct types in jvm codegen and runtime

nodes.bodyText: With Type ID, this should contain a version.
